name: TheMJVRadio
0:
”Alexa, open the m. j. v. radio”
”Alexa, start the m. j. v. radio”
”Alexa, ask the m. j. v. radio what's playing”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the m. j. v. radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to The MJV Radio - Fueling Your Faith 24/7
Launch your faith to a new level with The MJV Radio! Immerse yourself in an endless stream of powerful preaching, revival services, and inspiring teachings from Evangelist Michael Vidulich.

Key Features:
1. 24/7 Faith Infusion: Listen to an uninterrupted flow of faith-based preaching available around the clock. Whether you're looking for powerful sermons or uplifting teachings, The MJV Radio has it all, tailored to feed your spirit no matter the time of day.

2. Revive Your Spirit: Allow The MJV Radio to transform your life through the teaching of the Word of God. Messages from Evangelist Michael Vidulich and other Generals in the Faith are hand selected just for you!

3. Easy to Use: Our user-friendly interface ensures a seamless navigation experience. No matter what platform you choose to listen on, you're only a few taps away from increasing your faith!

4. Grow On-the-Go: Whether you're commuting, working, or just needing some faith-based background noise, The MJV Radio accompanies you wherever you are. Seamlessly incorporate spiritual growth into your daily routine. 

5. On-Demand Sermons: The MJV Radio App hosts The MJV Ministries Podcast for easy access to your favorite sermons, teachings, and more!

Download The MJV Radio now and launch your faith to a new level! 
Our mission is to win souls, revive the church, and train up the believer. Each broadcast is made to bring increase and encouragement to your life.

Stay connected: 
Website: https://mjvministries.com
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/mjvministries
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mjvministries
priv:
